00009 int BinaryDataRecorder::open( const std::string& s )
00010 {
00011    using namespace std;
00012    fd_.open( s.c_str(), fstream::out|fstream::binary );
00013    return (fd_.good())?0:-1;
00014 }
00015 
00016 
00018 void BinaryDataRecorder::record( const Socket& from, const Socket& to,
00019                                  const char* buf, size_t len )
00020 {
00021    // First element of the record is the direction
00022    char dest = ( from.name() == "L" )?'R':'L';   // destination transmission
00023    uint32_t llen = htonl(len); 
00024    fd_.write( &dest, sizeof(char));
00025    fd_.write( reinterpret_cast<char*>( &llen ), sizeof(uint32_t));
00026    fd_.write( buf, len );
00027 }
00028 
00029 
00030 void BinaryDataRecorder::shutdown() {
00031    fd_.close();
00032 }
00033 
00034 } // end namespace ntee
